item.title: DR Congo and Rwanda vow to agree peace plan within days
item.description: The two neighbouring nations sign a US-brokered deal aimed at stopping the fighting in eastern DR Congo.

item.title: Virginia Giuffre, Prince Andrew and Jeffrey Epstein accuser, dies
item.description: Giuffre alleged she was trafficked to the Duke of York when she was 17, which he has strenuously denied.

item.title: Russia and Ukraine 'very close to a deal', says Trump
item.description: The US president's envoy meets Vladimir Putin in Moscow, while Ukraine calls for more pressure on Russia.

item.title: How much has Elon Musk's Doge cut from US government spending?
item.description: BBC Verify has looked at the agency's biggest claimed savings, examining the figures and speaking to experts.

item.title: US judge arrested after allegedly obstructing immigration enforcement
item.description: Judge Hannah Dugan is accused of trying to help an undocumented immigrant who appeared in her court avoid arrest.
